text: Bila shuba Allah Taalaa ney musalmanon say unn ki janon ko aur unn kay maalon ko iss baat kay ewaz mein khareed liya hai kay unn ko jannat milay gi. Woh log Allah ki raah mein lartay hain jiss mein qatal kertay hain aur qatal kiye jatay hain iss per sacha wada kiya gaya hai toraat mein aur injeel mein aur quran mein aur Allah say ziyada apney ehad ko kaun poora kerney wala hai to tum log apni iss bey per jiss ka tum ney moamla thehraya hai khsuhi manao aur yeh bari kaamyabi hai
